Module count
Package count.model

Interface GLDParameters

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ancestor, DirectEM, DirectLikelihood, Likelihood, TreeWithRates, TreeWithRates.ParameterCache
public interface GLDParameters
Common interface for values associated with model parameters.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös

  • Method Details

    • getGainParameter

      double getGainParameter​(int node)
      Gain parameter for transition probabilities.
      Parameters:
      node - edge or root prior
      Returns:
      a non-negative value

    • getLossParameter

      double getLossParameter​(int node)
      Loss parameter for transition probabilities.
      Parameters:
      node - node this edge is leading to (or root prior)
      Returns:
      a value between 0.0 and 1.0

    • getDuplicationParameter

      double getDuplicationParameter​(int node)
      Duplication parameter for transition probabilities.
      Parameters:
      node - node this edge is leading to (or root prior)
      Returns:
      a value between 0.0 and 1.0

    • log1m

      static double log1m​(double param, double param_complement)
      log(1-x) if we know both x and 1.0-x at double precision. Uses the smaller value for calculation.
      Parameters:
      param - variable x at double precision
      param_complement - 1.0-x at double precision
      Returns:
